pages.text: $(li)Pigs are common passive creatures that can be found over the Overworld.$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l)Raw Porkchop$() upon death.$(br)$(li)They can be bred by giving them $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/carrot)Carrots$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can right click on a Pig while you are holding a $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/saddle)Saddle$(/l) in you hand to equip it.
Then you can ride the Pig right clicking on it control the direction with a $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/carrot_on_a_stick)Carrot on a Stick$(/l).
